alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:40PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Salt Lake... southwestern Davis...northwestern Utah and eastern Tooele Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 539 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Vernon to Camp Williams. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, Tooele, Grantsville, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, North Salt Lake and Woods Cross. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 283 and 313. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 77 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
